newsitem.title: USA: AIG shuts muni derivatives unit - market sources.
newsitem.headline: AIG shuts muni derivatives unit - market sources.

text.p: AIG Financial Products Corp, a unit of American International Group Inc, has decided to close its municipal derivatives operation, industry sources said Wednesday.
An AIG spokesman said, "AIG doesn't comment on personnel matters."
But industry sources familiar with the move said the company has disbanded the unit and laid off all but the managing director of the nine-member team.
JoAnn Palazzo will stay on at the company to oversee its portfolio, the sources said.
AIG was an aggressive player in the long-term muni swap arena, and often bid on deals with long maturities that other firms passed up.
"AIG has been one of the real pioneers in the muni derivatives business," one competitor said. "Their departure will be deeply felt and their presence will be sorely missed."
